Comments: Exposed moving parts and electrical hazard with the potential to cause harm through entanglement, cutting, and exposure to noise, dust, projectiles and sharp objects.

HeaderDescription: Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) Required (Check the box for required PPE)

Comments: Identify ON/OFF switch and emergency stop button (if applicable).
Ensure timber is in good condition, free from foreign material (such as nails).
Turn on local exhaust system (if available).
Check that the saw runs ‘true’ and does not wobble.
Keep hands clear of work piece and away from the blade.
Never leave the machine running unattended.
Switch off saw before removing waste material from the table.
